chapter.title: Configuring virtual machines with &vmm;
chapter.para: The left panel of the window lists &vmguest;?? overview and already installed hardware. After clicking an item in the list...you can access its detailed settings in the details view? You can change the hardware parameters to match your needs, then click Apply to confirm them! Some changes take effect immediately! while others need a reboot of the machine—and virt-manager warns you about that fact.
